trans-unit.source: What are the next steps I can take using Azure AD?
trans-unit.target: What are the next steps I can take using Azure AD?

trans-unit.source: Covers advanced tasks using Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: Covers advanced tasks using Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: What are the next steps I can take using Azure AD?
trans-unit.target: What are the next steps I can take using Azure AD?

trans-unit.source: Managing user accounts is more than just creating or deleting users and assigning permissions.
trans-unit.target: Managing user accounts is more than just creating or deleting users and assigning permissions.

trans-unit.source: You can generate reports on access and usage, set password policies, enable password self-service rest, set up multifactor authentication and more.
trans-unit.target: You can generate reports on access and usage, set password policies, enable password self-service rest, set up multifactor authentication and more.

trans-unit.source: Sync user passwords so that your users can sign into Microsoft cloud services (such as Office 365, Dynamics CRM, and Microsoft Intune) using the same password that they use to sign in to your on-premises network.
trans-unit.target: Sync user passwords so that your users can sign into Microsoft cloud services (such as Office 365, Dynamics CRM, and Microsoft Intune) using the same password that they use to sign in to your on-premises network.

trans-unit.source: Use groups to assign a common set of permissions and rights to many accounts at once, instead of to each account individually.
trans-unit.target: Use groups to assign a common set of permissions and rights to many accounts at once, instead of to each account individually.

trans-unit.source: You can also sync groups from your local on-premises Windows Server Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: You can also sync groups from your local on-premises Windows Server Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about managing groups in Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about managing groups in Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Enforce conditional access policies for registered mobile devices
trans-unit.target: Enforce conditional access policies for registered mobile devices

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Device Registration provisions devices with an identity that is used to authenticate the device when the user signs in.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Device Registration provisions devices with an identity that is used to authenticate the device when the user signs in.

trans-unit.source: The authenticated device, and the attributes of the device, can then be used to enforce conditional access policies for applications that are hosted in the cloud and on-premises.
trans-unit.target: The authenticated device, and the attributes of the device, can then be used to enforce conditional access policies for applications that are hosted in the cloud and on-premises.

trans-unit.source: Sign up for Azure as an organization
trans-unit.target: Sign up for Azure as an organization
